title: J.VER Men's Tuxedo Shirt Formal Dress Shirt Pleated Long Sleeve Button Down Shirts for Prom Party Wedding
description: Flex Fabric: This men's tuxedo dress shirt is made of 62% cotton, 35% polyester, 3% spandex. The fabric has some stretch to make your body move more flexible and the shirt is wrinkle resistant, easy to iron, save your time

Design: 1. Pleated front - The pleated front design is very fashionable. The tuxedo shirt can make you look elegant. 2. Two styles - It's a great tuxedo shirt for use with bow/long tie. 3. Adjustable cuffs - Choose a button position that fits you better

Size & Color: We provide you with a variety of sizes and colors to meet your different needs. Size of pleated dress shirt is US standard size. Please choose your tux shirt according to the size chart in our picture
Multiple Occasions: Men's tux dress shirts are suitable for all seasons and multiple occasions, such as work, dinner party, wedding, formal events, concert, date, stage, casual, church, and so on
Customer Service: Any problem about our product, please feel free to contact with us, we will respond and resolve your issues in a timely manner
